roleset.name: to adopt or accept as a member, association with

example.name: passive
example.text: One broadcasting executive familiar with the project said [0] the co-venture would target stations affiliated [*] with Fox because Fox has the desirable independent stations in most of the key cities .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Fulbright& Jaworski of Houston and Fenerty , Robertson , Fraser & Hatch of Calgary , Alberta , are affiliating [*-1] to help serve their energy-industry clients .
example.arg: Fulbright& Jaworski of Houston and Fenerty , Robertson , Fraser & Hatch of Calgary , Alberta ,
to help serve their energy-industry clients

example.name: arg2
example.text: I know that in my state , you can only vote in the primary if you are registered with that party affiliation , but I do n't know how many states allow everyone to vote .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The company said Mr. McKinney plans to retire because the process of affiliating American Fletcher into Banc One `` is considered completed . ''
